Paparazzi Developer's Guide

Welcome to the Paparazzi Developer's Guide -- the developer's resource for learning about the internal architecture of the Paparazzi project.

Developers that want to contribute to Paparazzi should read the following sections before starting work:

  • The Style Guides provides rules that developers should follow when writing new code for Paparazzi.

Paparazzi Technical Primers provide introductory materials for new developers on various specific topics.
